title: Khun Churn - Eathai
description: One location of a restaurant chain originally from Chiang Mai. This branch is a booth in Eathai Food Center, in the Central Embassy Shopping Mall. Accessible by Skytrain Chidlom and Ploenchit stations. The stall is towards the back of the food court. Offers meat-free meals prepared using tofu, mushrooms, and veggies as the core ingredients with plenty of vegan options.
streetAddress: Central Embassy Shopping Center, 1031 Ploenchit Rd, Pathumwan, Lumpini
